title: Social Surplus Maximization in Sponsored Search Auctions Requires Communication. (arXiv:2305.07729v1 [cs.GT])
abstract: We show that computing the optimal social surplus requires $\Omega(mn)$ bits of communication between the website and the bidders in a sponsored search auction with $n$ slots on the website and with tick size of $2^{-m}$ in the discrete model, even when bidders are allowed to freely communicate with each other.

Title: Social Surplus Maximization in Sponsored Search Auctions Requires Communication. (arXiv:2305.07729v1 [cs.GT])
Abstract: We show that computing the optimal social surplus requires $\Omega(mn)$ bits of communication between the website and the bidders in a sponsored search auction with $n$ slots on the website and with tick size of $2^{-m}$ in the discrete model, even when bidders are allowed to freely communicate with each other.
translated_title: 在赞助搜索拍卖中实现社会剩余最大化需要沟通
translated_abstract: 我们展示了在一个赞助搜索拍卖中，在离散模型中，对于一个包含$n$个广告位且tick size大小为$2^{-m}$的拍卖，即使竞标者可以自由地相互通信，计算最优社会剩余需要在网站和竞标者之间传递$\Omega(mn)$的比特信息。
tldr: 在赞助搜索拍卖中，为了最大化社会剩余，必须进行大量的沟通，以便在拍卖结束前确定最优策略。
en_tdlr: In sponsored search auctions, to maximize social surplus, extensive communication is required in order to determine optimal strategies before the end of the auction.
